entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Miscou Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:01 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miscou Island 01:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 54 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets becoming mixed with freezing rain in the afternoon except rain along parts of the coast. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to rain mixed with freezing rain in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
